scripts.bootstrap: CYPRESS_INSTALL_BINARY=0 lerna exec npm install && npm run build
scripts.bootstrap:web: CYPRESS_INSTALL_BINARY=0 lerna exec npm install --ignore @aph/mobile* && npm run build:web
